author: cms-sw
body:
In G4ADEPT_X IBs, we build vecgeom with cuda and this resulted in few cuda object files in the libvecgeom.a. when linking vecgeom in to CMSSW with LTO then linking fails specially when the cuda objects rom libvecgeom.a are needed in cmssw. In past we have seen cuda/LTO link issues that is why we disable lto for cuda in cmssw. This change builds G4ADEPT_X IBs without LTO

FYI @civanch , @SeverinDiederichs
title: G4ADEPT_X: Build without lto
